entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023
